code:
﻿%% EasyBudget - Visualizzazione Obiettivi di Risparmio
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant F as Frontend
    participant API as SavingsGoalController
    participant S as GoalService
    participant R as GoalRepository
    participant DB as Database

    U->>F: Visualizza sezione Obiettivi
    F->>API: GET /api/goals
    API->>S: GetGoals()
    S->>R: FetchByUser()
    R->>DB: SELECT * FROM Goals WHERE UserId = ?
    DB-->>R: Lista Obiettivi
    R-->>S: Lista
    S-->>API: Lista
    API-->>F: JSON con gli obiettivi
    F-->>U: Mostra progressi
